attributes.action: Create an independent body to fully review, establish and maintain a consistent electricity generation policy to meet the future needs of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So many people in the UK have fixed ideas, many of them incorrect or biased, about the way ahead for power generation in the UK that this whole arena becomes a political hot potato and no politician wishes to be associated with it.  An independent body of professionals needs to be established so that this area, key to the future of the UK, is handled consistently in the future.
